long_description: Strong and lightweight, the SunCloud Atlas Reader polarized sunglasses are a great all-around pair of shades for on the water or on the town. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. For close-in vision choose from 1 of these powers: +1.50, +2.00 and +2.50 bifocal lenses. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Black frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare without distorting colors in bright conditions. Tortoise frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast in bright conditions. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Sized to fit large faces.
